Comment: They were ordered to recreate the circus that was the Cass Report here in the US. It’s all bread and circus to distract you from how hard you will be struggling with the coming shortages.  The Cass Report was debunked as pseudoscience, and as grifter pseudoscience goes- what America creates from this will inevitably be debunked by actual scientists and actual science eventually, given those scientists are willing to be crushed by the admin for sharing findings that disagree with the admin’s feelings.  What matters is how they’ve already planned to use the predetermined outcome of the US’ version of the Cass Report given that the animus aligned control the purse in addition to all forms of government.   They’ve already declared that trans people do not exist- now they need to actually make them not exist. This is the beginning of that process. In tandem to this, they are destroying therapy and suicide prevention services for those same people.  This regime believes that you will be grateful for these actions having been done towards this group of people, with no expense spared using your tax dollars in pursuit of erasing this population, in spite of your empty bellies, empty shelves, and empty Christmas trees.

Comment: Referring to when DeSantis ordered a similar report to be created with a predetermined pseudoscientific outcome, and when his HHS department refused because they were scientists being commanded to be anti-science, they were all fired and replaced with loyal stooges who produced the report with the desired outcome within a month’s time?   And this is the same DeSantis who then used that outcome he demanded as justification for restricting access to healthcare for both trans minors and adults, restricting public access for trans minors and adults, and restricting education for trans minors and adults?
